tests.explanation: The original program correctly returns the index of the last 0 in the input array [0, 1, 0], which is 2. The mutant program, however, simply checks if each element is truthy or falsy, and returns the index of the last truthy element, which is 1, instead of the index of the last zero.

The original program correctly returns the index of the last 0 in the input array [45, 0, 0, 89, 0, 23], which is 4. The mutant program, however, returns the index of the third element, which is the last truthy value, instead of the correct index.
